# userInfo

**Instance Property**

Additional details about the error.

## Declaration

```swift
var userInfo: [String : Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentErrorKey] values in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/passkit_apple_pay_and_wallet/pkpaymenterror/2887004-erroruserinfo] property to provide more details for an error, for example, to indicate the part of the address that’s incorrect.

## Describing the error

- **code**: The error code for this instance.
- **errorCode**: The error code for this instance.
- **errorUserInfo**: Additional details about the error.
